text: Ghost Stories is the sixth hit studio album by rock-pop band Coldplay. The singles "Magic", "Midnight", "A Sky Full of Stars", "True Love" and "Ink"are featured in the album . The album was released in Summer 2014. == Track listings == === Original track list forGhost Stories=== # "Always in My Head" # "Magic" # "Ink" # "True Love" # "Midnight" # "Another's Arms" # "Oceans" # "A Sky Full of Stars" # "O" === Bonus track === # "All Your Friends" # "Ghost Story" # "O (Reprise)" Category:Coldplay albums Category:2014 albums
title: Ghost Stories
